name: Dating Your Favorite Celebrity! (Your Favorite Celebrity is Zac Efron)
name_original: Dating Your Favorite Celebrity! (Your Favorite Celebrity is Zac Efron)
description:
Congrats, my dude! The love of your life is within your grasp. This dating sim offers you the opportunity to win over your favorite celebrity and date the heck out of him!

...Your favorite celebrity is Zac Efron, right?

This dating sim includes, like, maybe just one or two High School Musical references, idk, and gross overuse of the word smooch. 

WHAT TEAM?

@omgmolly

Feel free to drop me a line if you have feedback, constructive criticism, or compliments about how cute my hair looks today ✨
